title: @ManWolfAxeBoss: are you playing Mirage: Arcane Warfare?

embed.description: Special thanks to Torn Banner Studios for sponsoring this video. You can check out the game at http://store.steampowered.com/app/368420 Jeremy, Ryan, Jack, and Gavin test out their spell castin', sword smashin', head choppin' skills in Arcane Warfare Mirage. It's simply a magical gathering of fun.

body:
I had this playing in the background while browsing the intertubes and heard one of them say "I got killed by ManAxeWolf or something" so I switched to the video and sure enough, you (or someone with your name) was in the video, haha (you can skip to the score page at 27:47)

Cheers!

replies.body:
Yup, that's me. I'm a big fan of Chivalry and have been playing a ton of Mirage. Really dig it!

Current name is "Pearl Hogbash" if you want to add me and play :)
Nice! It looks like a cool game, unfortunately I'm a filthy mac user so I my options are basically play League or live vicariously through other gamers :3. Thanks for the offer though!
